net.realmproject.dcm.features.recording

Interface Recordable

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.io.Serializable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    Command, Frame, State

    public interface Recordable
extends java.io.Serializable
    Interface to request/hint that something should be recorded. The return value of isRecordRequested is non-binding. Entities may be recorded even without a request. Entities which request recording may be ignored if there is no recorder configured, or of the recorder chooses to ignore the request.
    Author:
    NAS
